p.s: CPS should have taken Pearl away from Margot and the trailer park, put her into a foster home and help her to get a good education and prepare for a better way of life.
In the following I am going to discuss if this statement is right or not.
First of all we can say that Pearl had to live in a car for her whole life.
This is one of the main reasons CPSChild Protective Services should have taken Pearl away because she wouldn't have to live in a car her whole life.
She could have lived in a house with her own room and her own bed.
Another reason to take Pearl away is that the trailer park is a very dangerous area because you can buy guns anywhere in the park.
The lack of safety is also shown with the murder of Margot without a reason.
You could say that the CPSChild Protective Services would have helped Pearl to get a better education but on the other hand we have the example of Helen.
She didn't get enough education even though she got taken by CPSChild Protective Services.

On the one hand you could get a better life and live in a house with your own room and bed, but on the other hand you could also end up like Helen, who had to sleep on the floor and only got cereals to eat.
Even if she wouldn't have to live in a car anymore she could still live under bad conditions like Helen did.
Furthermore you could add that Pearl wouldn't get enough love from her foster family like she got from Margot.
Helen is a good example for this because she never got to experience the love from her real parents.
The American Dream tells us that you can get a better and independent way of life, no matter who your parents are, just by working hard.
This statement tells that the American Dream is possible to achieve if CPSChild Protective Services takes care of you, even if you didn't get enough education.
Alltogether it can be said that this statement is not always true because Helen proofsproves the opposite.
On the one hand Pearl would get a house to live in but or the other hand we can tell that her life with her mom wasn't that bad because she got enough education.
